trends: There has been one other sighting in Spencer
There were no other sightings in Spencer on or around August 26th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsIt wa approximatly 2;30 am on the 26th of august,I had came outside ,my home to exercise my dogs and was looking at the stars, when I noticed, what appeared to be a satillite traveling fast from the Northwest, just above that horizon to the Southeast.I was facing east and as it approached my approximate "Two O`clock positin" nearing the Southeast horizon, It Abruptly mad a "90-Degree" turn to the east and then deminished from my sight. and as we all know, satilites , don`t change coarse !
Summary: appeared to be a satillite moving at a fast rate, from SW to NE,however, it made a sudden 90 degree turn at my two-o`clock towards the east.
